mapper.sql: ID, EMPLOYEE_CODE, SN, TIME, STATE, VERIFY, WORKCODE, BATCH_DATE, DELETED, CRE_PRO_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MOD_PRO_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
mapper.delete: delete from T_SIGN where DELETED = '0' AND ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into T_SIGN (ID, EMPLOYEE_CODE, SN, TIME, STATE, VERIFY, WORKCODE, BATCH_DATE, DELETED, CRE_PRO_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MOD_PRO_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE ) values (#{id}, #{employeeCode}, #{sn}, #{time}, #{state}, #{verify}, #{workcode}, #{batchDate}, #{deleted}, #{creProId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDate}, #{modProId}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{lastModifiedDate} )

insert into T_SIGN
ID,
EMPLOYEE_CODE,
SN,

DELETED,

mapper.update:
update T_SIGN
EMPLOYEE_CODE = #{employeeCode},
SN = #{sn},
TIME = #{time},
STATE = #{state},
VERIFY = #{verify},
WORKCODE = #{workcode},
BATCH_DATE = #{batchDate},
DELETED = #{deleted},
CRE_PRO_ID = #{creProId},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate},
MOD_PRO_ID = #{modProId},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy},
LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_SIGN set EMPLOYEE_CODE = #{employeeCode}, SN = #{sn}, TIME = #{time}, STATE = #{state}, VERIFY = #{verify}, WORKCODE = #{workcode}, BATCH_DATE = #{batchDate}, DELETED = #{deleted}, CRE_PRO_ID = #{creProId}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate}, MOD_PRO_ID = #{modProId}, LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy}, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate} where ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT S_T_SIGN.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into T_SIGN (ID, EMPLOYEE_CODE, SN, TIME, STATE, VERIFY, WORKCODE, BATCH_DATE, DELETED, CRE_PRO_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MOD_PRO_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE ) values (#{id}, #{employeeCode}, #{sn}, #{time}, #{state}, #{verify}, #{workcode}, #{batchDate}, #{deleted}, #{creProId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDate}, #{modProId}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{lastModifiedDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_SIGN WHERE DELETED = 0
